about_the_game:
In this Dark Lily Girls' Academy, there are three rules you must follow.

１．Always greet others with a smile and be polite.

２．Never approach the old school building.

３．Do not pry into secrets.

Features of This Game
Throughout this game, you will face numerous inexplicable events occurring within the academy... The strange incidents happening in the school, the rules of the academy, and the five girls you will meet in such a setting.

The only clue you have is something called "Himegoto." However, knowing about it is taboo within this academy.

This game is a visual novel where you will explore the "Himegoto" and uncover the mysteries. Players will experience an elegant and glamorous story set in a secret garden.

Message from the Academy
Greetings, prospective students.
Welcome to the Dark Lily Girls' Academy.
By reading "About This Game," it means you are at least interested in this academy... isn't it?
You might already be excited, with bright eyes looking towards the future that awaits.

Now, please proceed with the preparations from the registration page.
All students and staff are eagerly awaiting your enrollment.

Oh, by the way...

Once you enroll, you will likely come to know, but just in case...

About those five girls...

short_description: Nevertheless, if you insist on uncovering their special secrets... consider this your warning. You will meet young women, each with their own hidden mysteries, and soon find yourself drawn into a whirlpool of secrets. Oh, do be careful. In this academy, one must never "pry into secrets."
